introduce.name: about
introduce.title: About Have A Seat Labubu - Your Premium Art Lifestyle Brand
introduce.label: Brand Story
introduce.description: Have A Seat Labubu is a premium lifestyle brand that combines artistic excellence with contemporary design. Our unique Labubu art pieces and lifestyle products bring distinctive artistic experiences to your daily life, creating a perfect blend of art and functionality.

image.alt: Have A Seat Labubu Brand Story - Artistic Lifestyle Brand

items.title: Premium Craftsmanship
items.description: Every Have A Seat Labubu product is crafted with premium materials and meticulous attention to detail, ensuring exceptional quality and durability.

faq.name: faq
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Learn more about Have A Seat Labubu

items.title: How to purchase products?
items.description: You can purchase products through our official website or physical stores. Online purchases support multiple payment methods, including credit cards and PayPal.

items.title: Is there a return policy?
items.description: Yes, we offer a 7-day no-questions-asked return policy. Custom products are excluded as they are made to individual specifications.

items.title: How to maintain products?
items.description: We recommend regular cleaning, avoiding direct sunlight, and keeping them dry. Please refer to the product manual for specific maintenance methods.

items.title: Do you offer international shipping?
items.description: Yes, we offer worldwide shipping. Please check the shopping cart page for specific shipping fees and delivery times.
